short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This favicon tool creates the favicon (.ico & .png) and the HTML code to make your website looks awesome on every browser and device

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Favic-o-matic generates the favicon, both .ico & .png, and the HTML code needed by your web project.
Just one or two clicks and your website will look awesome on every browser, device and platform, including iOs, Android, Metro tiles and more!
